action_plan: Tap on the Chrome app to open it.
Once Chrome opens, tap on the menu icon (three dots) in the top right corner.
Tap on 'Settings' from the drop-down menu.
Scroll down to the 'Site settings' option and tap on it.
Find and tap on 'Pop-ups and redirects'.
Toggle the switch to 'Off' to disable pop-ups.
